data.actual_result: The Badge stays there, until you leave and return the Friends tab.
data.expected_result: The little badge next to Suggestions is removed.
data.short_description: Friend Suggestions Badge retains after accepting / denying all requests
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a Friend Suggestion (from Steam, B.net ETC) - Accept or Deny it - Slide to another another tab within Friends
